Definition: To talk cock in Singlish means to speak nonsense or ramble on without making any sense. It is often used as a humorous way to refer to someone who is talking nonsense or spouting irrelevant details in a conversation. Overall, "talk cock" is a commonly used Singlish phrase that is understood by many Singaporeans. Its humorous connotation adds a playful element to casual conversations among friends and family.
Example:
1. Stop talking cock lah, just get to the point!
2. He keeps talking Cockney like I can understand him. Talk cock only, seriously.
